price: Ɔno na Ɔda Nensεnkyerεnee no adi dekyerε mo, εna Osane akͻnhoma firi soro ma mo. Obi a ͻdwen (saa nsεnkyerεnee yi ho na) ͻdetu neho foͻ ne obi a ͻdane ne ho kͻ (Nyankopͻn hͻ).
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُنَزِّلُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزۡقٗاۚ وَمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلَّا مَن يُنِيبُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yurīkum āyātihi wayunazzilu lakum mina al-samāi riz'qan wamā yatadhakkaru illā man yunību
